= EmLinux =

Latest stable release - emlinux-0.2.

Released on Nov 30rd 2010.

EmLinux is part of the Embox project.

EmLinux is a tool which can be used to generate a tiny Linux image.
It was written with embedded systems in mind.


 * [http://embox.googlecode.com/files/emlinux-0.2.txz emlinux-0.2.txz]
 * [http://embox.googlecode.com/files/emlinux-0.1.txz emlinux-0.1.txz]
